function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of antigen tests with lower sensitivity","Impact":"Inaccurate test results and delayed diagnosis of SARS infection","Mitigation":"Combine antigen tests with other diagnostic methods for early and late stages of infection","Technologies":"Improved antigen test technology with higher sensitivity","People":"Individuals undergoing COVID-19 testing","Owner":"Health organizations and medical professionals"},{"Description":"Increased demand for ventilators","Impact":"Inadequate availability of ventilators for patients with severe COVID-19 cases","Mitigation":"Rapid production scaling and innovative ventilator design","Technologies":"Scalable ventilator production and innovative ventilator design","People":"Patients requiring ventilatory assistance","Owner":"Governments, research groups, and companies"},{"Description":"Use of manual resuscitators for ventilator automation","Impact":"Reliability and effectiveness of automated ventilators","Mitigation":"Thorough testing and quality control of the automated ventilator systems","Technologies":"Automated ventilator technology","People":"Patients relying on ventilators","Owner":"Medical device manufacturers and health organizations"}]}
